name: Mail Sender
description: This plugin provide information about the server to send a e-mail

Sender.name: Sender Mail
Sender.description: Yadoms must use an existing mail account. Enter here the email to use to send emails (will also be used as 'from' field of sent emails).
Sender.regexErrorMessage: Must be a valid email address

account.name: Account type
account.description: If your email account provider is not found in this list, choose "Other"

password.name: Password
password.description: This can be the GoogleApps password (see https://security.google.com/settings/security/apppasswords)

Security.name: Security
Security.description: The SMTP server requires a secure connection

authentication.name: Authentication required by server
authentication.description: Only if SMTP server requires an authentication

mailSubject.name: Mail subject
mailSubject.description: The subject of the mail to send, use %FIRST_LINE% to insert the first line of the text sent by Yadoms
